title: Sid Meiers Civilization V 5 v1.0.1.167 Update plus Crack
description:
Civilization V v1.0.1.167 Update and Crack. DX9 & DX11 versions

Cracked by 1stNoCd released via 3dmgame.


1.0.1.167
Released 1/20/2011
[CRASHES]
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Dead interceptor crash fix (occurred frequently in late-game, usually on the AI turn)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Movement limit crash fix (occurred when any high-movement unit, a gunship in this case, made use of the railroad bonus and moved beyond the engine visualization limits)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Crash fix for diplo AI. When the player witnesses an AI leader buy a minor ally, and aggressively purchased them back, the game would eventually crash when the AI leader would correctly try to complain to you about it.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢The following crashes were all discovered via the Steam Crash Reporting system that Civilization V utilizes:
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Crash - pCitizens->GetCityPlotFromIndex(iPlotLoop); is returning NULL in the CvPlayer::DoRevolt loop.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Crash - Occasionally strange values are sent to the movement cursor code. Wrap and clamp the values before they get to the pathfinder.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Crash - Fix to divide by zero crash with AI buying plots.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Crash - In RouteValid, the CvTacticalAnalysisMap cell thinks a plot is claimed, but the plot itself has no owner.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Crash - Era out of bounds during a reload.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Crash - During a resync, a crash happens when GameplayUnitCreated calls CvPlot::GetActiveFogOfWarMode apparently because the game's ActiveTeam is NO_TEAM (-1).

[GAMEPLAY]
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Fix to Golden Age length (for Reformation policy with both the Persian trait and Chichen Itze)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Corrected duration of golden ages generated from Taj Mahal and when a Persian player has Chichen Itza (Before the multiple 50% additions were "compounded" rather than added together into a 100% bonus.)

[UI]
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Fix to blank science victory details screen


Make sure that you install Update 6 from Skidrow First. (http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6090486/Sid.Meiers.Civilization.V.Update.6-SKIDROW-%5Btracker.BTARENA.org%5D)

Copy all the files in this directory into you Civilization Install Directory.
